task.title: Installing Sametime Connect and Embedded clients on Windows
task.shortdesc: This topic covers basic installation for the Sametime standalone client on Windows.

context.p: Before getting started, it review the client installation customization options. Customizing the client can ease your deployment.

step.cmd: Decompress the client installation package into a temporary directory.
In the temporary directory, locate and double-click SETUP.EXE.
step.info: The installation process begins. When prompted, select the language to be displayed in the installation wizard windows.

step.cmd: From the Welcome screen, click Next.
On the License Agreement screen, review the license information.
step.info: To continue click I accept the terms in the license agreement and then click Next.

step.cmd: On the next screen, specify where to install the client and then click Next.
step.info: The default value for the Install location field is C:\HCL\Sametime Connect. You can select another location, you must remember it for future tasks.

step.cmd: Click Install to start the install process.
step.info: After the install is complete, click Finish.
